brooklyn.util.guava
[Java] Class KeyTransformingLoadingCache

java.lang.Object
  com.google.common.cache.AbstractLoadingCache
      brooklyn.util.guava.KeyTransformingLoadingCache

public class KeyTransformingLoadingCache
extends AbstractLoadingCache

A cache that transforms its keys before deferring to a delegate LoadingCache.
